name: sevastream
description: Real-time donation streaming platform with blockchain transparency

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run frontend:dev" "npm run backend:dev" "npm run ai:dev"
scripts.build: npm run frontend:build && npm run backend:build
scripts.test: npm run frontend:test && npm run backend:test
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../ai-services && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/dist backend/dist
scripts.lint: npm run frontend:lint && npm run backend:lint
scripts.deploy:contracts: cd smart-contracts && npx hardhat deploy --network polygon-mumbai

author: SevaStream Team
